pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/released-2021.7.20-green.svg?longCache=True)](https://pypi.org/project/connection/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ pip install connection```### Examples```python>>> import connection>>> connection.check()True```timeout```python>>> connection.check(timeout=2)```url```python>>> connection.check(url='https://github.com/')```
